current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
Authorizing expenditures by the Committee
		  on Environment and Public Works of the Senate.

committee-name.#tail:

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Environment and Public
			 Works

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Committee on Environment and Public Works

			 through September 30, 2013, in its discretion—

text.#text:
